thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Location
thread.title_full: Fantastic Location - Review of Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Globetrekkergj
title: Fantastic Location
text:
Excellant Hotel!
Great attentive staff, convenient location, and affordable.
The hotel is not in the heart of Paris, which I love. There is less congestion. The train station is minutes away, and there is a huge shopping center as well.
There is some construction going on, however noise was not a problem.
Wi-fi worked great. There is no airport shuttle offered, but the train is a good enough option.
I will definitely stay here again.
